1.content: Mission $1 complete *Nyaa*! Diligence leads you to wealth *Nyaa*!
1.title: Mission complete!
1.desc: Enables push notifications for when a commission has been completed.

2.content: Our Merchant is about to be overflowing with coins! They'll be mine if you don't come back *Nyaa~*!
2.title: Coins received
2.desc: Enables push notifications for when the Merchant has reached max capacity.

3.content: Our storage is about to be overflowing with oil! They'll be mine if you don't come back *Nyaa~*!
3.title: Oil received
3.desc: Enables push notifications for when the Canteen has reached max capacity.

4.content: Commander~ There's nothing to eat *Nyaa*~ We're starving *Nyaa*~...
4.title: Out of ammo
4.desc: Enables push notifications for when all the food in the Dorm has been consumed.

5.content: $1 has finished $2! It's time to buy a new textbook *Nyaa*!
5.title: Class is over
5.desc: Enables push notifications for when Tactical Class has been completed.

6.content: The course in the Lecture Hall is over, nya! We should set up the next one, nya...
6.title: Lecture's over
6.desc: Enables push notifications for when Lecture Hall proficiency has been depleted.

7.content: The research task "$1" has been completed, nya! Let's check our progress, nya~
7.title: Research complete
7.desc: Enables push notifications for when a Research Project has been completed.

8.content: Progress has been made in the development of $1! Let's head down to the development docks, nya!
8.title:
Development has 
progressed
8.desc: Enables push notifications for when a new quest is unlocked in the Shipyard.

9.content: Meowfficer training has been completed, nya! Let's go greet our new little friend, nya!
9.title:
Meowfficer training 
complete
9.desc: Enables push notifications for when a Meowfficer has finished training.
